entry.title: LihuaYuan
entry.content:
Address for Communications

696, Fenghe South Road, Nanchang, Jiangxi Province, China
Citizenship Chinese

Educational Background

B.S. Majored physics, Jiangxi Normal University, China, 1995
M.S. Majored engineering thermal physics, Nanchang University, China, 1998
Ph.D. Majored measuring and testing technologies and instruments, Nanjing University of Aeronautics and Astronautics, China, 2010

Professional Experience

Associate Professor, Nanchang Hangkong University, 2006/10-present
Lecturer, Nanchang Hangkong University, 2001/7-2006/9
Teaching assistant, Nanchang Hangkong University, 1998/7－2001/6

Current Research

Infrared nondestructive testing

Selected Publications

Wang Jiangfei, Yuan Lihua*, Zhu Zhengguang, Yuan Mingyuan. Accurate Detection of a Defective Area by Adopting a Divide and Conquer Strategy in Infrared Thermal Imaging Measurement. Journal of the Korean Physical Society, 2018, Vol. 73, No. 11, pp. 1644-1649.

Zhu Zhengguang, Yuan Lihua*, Wu Guanhua, Wu Wei, and Wang Jiacheng. Modeling Temperature Distributions in Thermal Barrier Coatings with Various Thicknesses. Russian Journal of Nondestructive Testing, 2018, Vol. 54, No. 8, pp. 610-617.

Wang Jiangfei, Yuan Lihua*, Yuan Mingyuan. The Detection Research to Night License Plate Based on Infrared Thermal Imaging Technology, 2018 International Conference on Materials Manufacturing Technology and Chemical Science (MMTCS 2018).

YUAN Lihua, WANG Jiangfei, ZHU Zhengguang, GENG Minjun. Detection of Material Surface Cracks by Infrared Thermal Imaging Microscope. Infrared Technology, 2018,40(06):612-617.

Hua Haoran, Yuan Lihua*, Wu Guanhua, Wu Wei. Defect quantitative detection based on transmission infrared thermal wave method [J].Infrared and Laser Engineering, 2016, 45(2): 0204007.

Xiong Juan, Yuan Lihua*, Wu Guanhua, Wu Wei. Impact damage feature detection for carbon fiber board by pulse thermography [J].Laser & Infrared,2016, 46(9):1085-1090.

Yuan Lihua, Li Ming, Li Junhua. Study of genetic algorithms based on pleiotropy [J]. Systems

Key Laboratory of Nondestructive Test (Ministry of Education), Nanchang Hangkong University
